thread.title: Helen Wong’s Sichuan: Hot Destination For Agents
thread.title_full: Helen Wong’s Sichuan: Hot Destination For Agents

author: Thidawan Tunya
title: Helen Wong’s Sichuan: Hot Destination For Agents
text:
Email 
THERE were smiles all round recently as leading Asia specialist Helen Wong’s Tours joined hands with Sichuan Provincial Tourism Administration to host a special educational to China for eleven Australian travel agents. 
The 10-day familiarisation, between September 19-28, focused on such hot destinations as Chengdu (home of the giant panda), Jiuzhaigou and its scenic alpine region, Huanglong, Dujiangyan and Leshan. Share this:
